phrases: In the summer when I was 16,
I changed my brand of cigarettes to Seven Stars.
Because Ren smoked them.
I increased the number of piercings to match his.
And I wore matching boots.
We slept in the same bed, and we dreamt the same dream.
Still, Ren left me behind.
Perhaps somewhere deep in my heart,
I had not forgiven him for that.
The same way that I could not forgive my mother.
Blinking eyes call the wind
A smile clears all the noise away
The angel in your eyes whispers
Everything begins now
Can you feel it now Can you feel it now
It is like being caught in a wave
Pulling on my heart Pulling on my heart
Breath held, arms reaching out
Baby this world is different from yesterday's
You are the only one I can see
Baby my wish on a wing
This sky is torn
By a single overflowing word
I am so weak.
This is already my fifth one.
I could only manage to quit for three months.
But, I need something to relax me.
I wonder what happened to Nobu after that.
I came down hard on him, saying some merciless things.
I will apologize to him when I see him at work.
But... will he come?
I am so sleepy.
I am not in the mood to go to work.
But I hafta make a living.
It does help to not hafta pay for studio time,
but how much longer is it going to take
for things to start moving toward our debut?
I wonder if Hachi's asleep.
Takumi's got recording, so he would have left by now.
Do not ignore me!
Come here and have a seat.
I have something important to discuss with you.
I have got to get changed and go to work.
Then come out after you get changed.
It will not take much time.
And put out that cigarette, okay?
It is bad for the baby.
Calm down.
I have decided to watch over Hachi gently no matter what she decides to do.
You want something to drink?
We have decided to get married.
Married?
So, I have got to first talk this over with my agent
on how we should proceed with this,
but I want to hurry and find a new place for her.
This place has no elevator, which is hard on a pregnant woman.
And she has a tendency to be careless,
so it is got to be a place with security.
So, I am sorry but... could you find a new roommate?
What is that?
Why are things jumping forward so quickly?
I was not even aware that you were pregnant.
And what about Nobu?
Why are you keeping quiet?
I do not get it.
But sure, that is not fair to you having her move out so suddenly,
so I will pay half the rent until you find a new roommate.
I do not need it!
Really?
But we created these circumstances.
Actually the timing's perfect.
I was planning on moving in with Ren anyway.
If that is the case, we will just stop renting this place.
No wait...
I wanted to talk to you about that too.
You need to think about Ren's situation a bit.
Huh?
About your relationship.
If everything from your past to present comes to light,
it is the kind of thing the tabloids go after.
So what?
If Trapnest is going to fail because of some scandal,
then it is not much of a band to begin with.
No, in fact, I am more worried about us receiving more attention.
When a band becomes as popular as ours,
the public gradually shows more interest in things other than the band's music.
It cannot be helped.
And we can take advantage of it, too.
But honestly, I would hate for us to be judged
because of stuff unrelated to our music.
So I want to avoid the chance of scandal encouraging that.
As someone involved in the music business,
I am sure you would understand.
How are you okay with getting married?
Me getting married will not attract much attention from the public.
I am not nearly as recognized as Ren.
Besides, I do not think
you want to draw attention in that way before your debut.
Of course not!
I could not stand it.
Then you need to be more cautious with your actions.
I am not telling you not to see him.
I get it.
I will be more careful.
I am glad you get it.
I tried to talk to Ren about this, but he refuses to listen to me,
so it was bothering me.
That is all I have to talk about.
I should be heading back.
What is with her?
She is like Takumi's faithful dog.
I will not be able to come during our recording...
but when we are done, we will go and meet your parents.
So do not worry unnecessarily and get lots of rest.
But I do not feel that ill that I need to stay in bed.
While you are away, I will go see a real estate agent.
What kind of place should I be looking for?
You are even hastier than I am.
You that eager to play newlyweds?
I was just thinking you are really busy,
so I wanted to help in any way that I can.
You want to move out fast
because you are finding it hard to face Nana, right?
She seems to be very good friends with Nobu,
so it is got to be uncomfortable.
And she does not hide the fact that she is upset about this.
FROM: REIRA SUBJECT: GOOD MORNING.
I AM DONE WITH THE LYRICS.
IT IS AN INNOCENT LOVE STORY.
FROM LOVELY REIRA
I will talk to someone at my agency about finding a place,
and have him list up a few options.
You can go view these places when you are feeling better
and decide on a place you like.
You are not looking as pale.
Are you feeling less nauseous?
Mhm.
Thanks.
I feel much better.
Takumi...
Should not you be going to your recording?
I still have plenty of time.
But this may not be good for the baby in my tummy.
It will be fine.
It will be fine.
Nana will hear us.
Do not worry.
Just keep your voice down, and she will never notice.
But she is already pretty angry!
I need you to tame my anger first!
I cannot stand the thought of other guy doing it with you.
Do not you worry about a thing and just focus on pleasing me.
The bed we got from Mizukoshi's store was old
and the bedsprings would squeak.
It is driving me crazy.
You are a lot more important to me than a boyfriend, Nana.
Liar!
It seems like I am head over heels in love with Nobu.
Traitor!
Could you find a new roommate?
Tell me that yourself!
If you do not want it, I do not want it either.
I want to use the same things you do.
Why do not you use the strawberry glass?
Because there are only two of them.
What if I break one?
But if you do not use them, what is the point of having them?
Yeah, but still, it is too sad if one of a set breaks.
You can use it, but be sure to be careful, okay?
It is too sad if one of a set breaks.
Nana?
Leave her alone.
Good...
They are together.
I am not sad anymore.
Huh?
When did she get here?
A ring of oath
Our red string
We cannot see it now
No promises either
What part of this is an innocent love story?
It seems to me more like a song about infidelity.
Huh?!
Huh?
But there is no ring of oath, right?
Yes, but you could interpret this
as the other guy having a ring on his finger.
Huh?!
You know, you have been acting awfully suspicious lately, Reira.
Are you having an affair?
That is not what it means!
But songs about infidelity sell pretty well!
But it is not like that, Mari!
This is about pure love!
A love that binds people together!
But one where you do not even kiss!
Speaking of ring of oath, Take...
Hm?
I am getting married.
- Huh?! -
It is all right, is not it?
- You are getting married?! -
You are getting married?!
What are you saying all of a sudden, Takumi?
And to say it here?
I trust the staff members here.
I-I-I need an explanation!
Huh?
You getting married is even less likely
than this single selling ten million copies!
My woman's pregnant.
Hachiko?!
You sure know a lot.
It is not like you, Takumi.
It is not like you!
It is not Nobu's baby?
Why would you fall for Hachiko's tactics so easily like that?!
Tactics?
Hachiko's objectives are to earn
the status of being the wife of a popular musician and your money!
She may have even lured you into doing it when she was ovulating!
TAKUMI
TAKUMI Takumi, I want to see you!
COME INSIDE ME. (SHE NEVER SAID THAT.)
I WANT TO SEE YOU!
Takumi, I want to see you!
COME INSIDE ME. (SHE NEVER SAID THAT.)
I WANT TO SEE YOU!
No, I doubt it was something she did on purpose.
But her objectives may be as you say.
I DID COME OUTSIDE.
But her objectives may be as you say.
I DID COME OUTSIDE.
Are you fine with a loveless relationship?!
Are you fine with a loveless relationship?!
Love comes later.
People love themselves more than anyone else.
They end up loving those who can fulfill the most desires they have.
In a way, that is the truth.
HIDEKI KASAI (45) DIRECTOR
In a way, that is the truth.
HIDEKI KASAI (45) DIRECTOR Huh?!
Why not?
Let them get married, Take.
Why do not we see where a relationship
between a bastard and a fad follower will take them?
This could be fun.
Easy for you to say.
Anyway, we must discuss this with the president.
Until we do, please, everyone, keep this a secret.
What a pain.
Let me do as I wish!
It is my marriage!
Well then, let us get started with the recording.
Huh?
Where is Reira?
She was here until a moment ago.
I am sure she will be right back.
We record the vocals later anyway.
We can do it without temporary vocals.
Mari, could you please go look for her?
Yes.
What?
Reira's your real name?
Mhm.
Well, almost.
It is spelled L-A-Y-L-A.
You know the Eric Clapton song, Layla?
Yeah.
It is a famous song.
My father loved that song, so he named me after it.
Even now when I am alone in my room,
I play that CD and I do not feel alone.
Lovely Layla.
The Japanese title is different...
That will be 5,500 yen.
I will be in touch.
Yes?
Hello?
Hello?
Shin,.,
What is the matter?
Where are you now, Reira?
What about the recording?
Did something happen?
Reira, are you all right?
Please do me a favor.
I am sorry.
Just tell me what it is.
I will do anything.
I do not need any more money.
Yasu,.,
Huh?
What?
Please give me Yasu's cell number.
Hello...
Nana?!
What the hell are you doing?!
You had me worried!
Nobu?
I called you a number of times since this morning,
but you did not pick up!
I was panicking a bit last night and said some mean things.
But I am the one this is happening to and went to work today,
so how dare you take the day off!
I am starting to hate myself for being so damn responsible.
MISSED CALL NOBUO MISSED CALL NOBUO MISSED CALL NOBUO
Ah, sorry.
Never mind.
I am used to your merciless oppression,
and I covered for you at work.
Where are you now?
At Ren's... place?
I am guessing Ren's not there because of work, right?
I am done with work today.
What do you say we grab a bite to eat before going to the studio?
Nobuo,.,
My treat!
You have got to let me spill out my sad story!
I am thinking, there really is something wrong with me.
I already know that, from long ago!
I cannot remember why I am here.
Am I still only half awake?
The last thing I remember was the strawberry glass about to roll off the table.
Those matching glasses were the first things we bought together...
Was I able to catch that glass...
before it fell?
You know, Hachi...
I was too small of a person
to be able to accept everything about you.
I was like a cheap glass.
It is just that I preferred the pain of breaking into pieces,
to the loneliness I felt from losing everything.
LOVELY LAYLA to the loneliness I felt from losing everything.
LOVELY LAYLA
I was just too fragile.
It is not your fault.
I cannot count how many nights
I wished tomorrow would never come
To live as I am without being fake
What do I need
If I do not believe in myself, what can I believe in
The answer is too close to see
Black tears are falling down
I have nothing, only sadness
I cannot put it into words
My whole body starts to ache
I cannot stand it anymore on my own
